Solving real world business chanllenges

We work with companies, governments, humanitarians, investors, supply chains, and communities to solve some of the world's most pressing challenges.

Business Reimagined

We deliver a diverse range of products and services in innovative companies across our value chain to help incubate, accelerate and commercialize new ideas, technologies, products and business models in our custodianship for a more sustainable planet.

Net Zero

We are committed to a low carbon agenda as we work together with our industry partners to become a net zero supply chain by 2025 or sooner.

Mining & Powerplant

We have partnered with Bapala Terra Inergy to provide innovative techology solutions in coal gasification, biomass and thermal energy powerplant development, and sustainable mining.

Business Optimization

Our multi-disciplinary teams assist you to communicate seamlessly with your stakeholders. We assess, manage and deliver business eco-systems, including SEO, app development, website design and disaster recovery.

Strategic Alliance:
Sri Srinivas Industries

Sri Srinivas Industries is a successful, sustainable, 3rd generation family-owned and operated business whose driving forces are ethical business, social purpose, and sustainable environmental practice. We created an alliance with Sri Srinivas Industries to supply the world's best premium cashew kernels, and do good for local communities.

Since 1981

One of India's leading cashew processors

400 Workers

In-house training supported by community development

500MT/mo Capacity

Processed into hand picked & sorted premium raw cashews
